archimate:ApplicationService.name: [Master IM] Master Identity Management (Application Service)
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation:
The source of truth for LSST staff and LSST users' identities and permissions.
The Master Identity Management system contains comprehensive information relevant to LSST staff and users permissions and organizational context. The Master Identity Management consists of a database holding this information and all the processes and procedures needed to maintain this information. The Master Identity Management also has applicaiton functions to update services that rely on it.
